title: Thrown
description: An emotional New Adult RomanceAmy is trying to get over the death of her mother and aunt. Promise Cove offers her a new start and an escape from the pain. She is closed-off emotionally and avoids relationships with others. Her only emotional outlet comes from self harm.Then she meets Dean Stoker, a local mechanic and friend of Amy's aunt. Stoker has a secret. He wants to be an artist. But he can only paint in secret because his father wants Stoker to be more like his dead brother James and forget about anything creative. Amy and Dean recognise a shared pain and become close. Barriers must be shattered and walls must come down before they can find real love.
author: Tabi Wollstonecraft
